WRITING.TEXT: I agree that art is subjective but the point is that civ V building models and overall city details lack compared to 4th or 6th installment. Every city looks almost the same within one cultural style. The city looks good when zoomed out though.
Still. The city consists mostly of houses and wonders. Most of the improvements are not visible compared to Civ 4/6.
Maybe but as someone pointed out that Civ V cities just lack the models for most buildings and most of them looks like made of cardboard.
I mean the details in Civ IV are on par with Civ VI but V looks just so bland to me.

WRITING.TITLE: Why does Civ V city art looks so crappy compared to Civ IV?
